CustomField.formula: SUBSTITUTE(SUBSTITUTE(SUBSTITUTE(if(LEN(ShippingStreet)>0, ShippingStreet & "," & BR() , "" )& if(LEN(ShippingCity)>0, ShippingCity & "," & BR() , "" )& if(LEN(ShippingState)>0, ShippingState & "," & BR() , "" )& if(LEN(ShippingPostalCode)>0, ShippingPostalCode & "," & BR(),"") & If(LEN(ShippingCountry) >0, ShippingCountry & ",","")+".","," & BR() &".", NULL),",.",NULL),".",null)
CustomField.label: Address
